full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 5RS WINDIASE and CITY STORE STURE your >COD FIVE RUPEES HREI FIVE RUPEES MARRIAGE AFFIDAVIT I, Jit Singh son of sh.Bawa Singh resident of village and post office Dhesian Kahna tehsil Phillaur distt. Jalandhar, Punjab do hereby solemnly affirm and declare as under: 1. That I was born at village Chak No 53 distt.Layallpur in the year 1901 2. That Kartar Singh is my real younger brother. 3. That he was married with Karm Kaur d/o sh.Ganga Singh of villge Motheda Kalan, tehsil Phillaur distt. Jalandhar on 10 JAN 1930. 4. That the marriage was solemnized at village Motheda Kalan tehsil Phillaur distt. Jalandhar according to PHERE CEREMONY. 5. That Karm Kaur is the legal wedded wife of Kartar Singh. 6. That our mother's name is smt. BANT KAUR DEPONENT L.7.1 VERIFICATION JIT SINGH I, further declare that the above particulars furnished by me are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief nothing has been kept concealed therein. PLACE: DEPONENT L.71 x DATED: JIT SINGH I identify the executent JITSINSH who has Signed/ Thumb Marked in my presence KishanSimph T.O.office Phasware Attested As Identifies Natary Public Phigwan
